Duty Free Shopping

One of the best parts of travelling is Duty Free shopping while waiting for your flight. At Changi Airport, you’ll get to enjoy prices cheaper than anywhere else in town. If you have just two hours to spare, maximise your time at our Duty Free favourites: Cosmetics & Perfumes by Shilla, Liquor & Tobacco by DFS and Electronics & Computers by Sprint-Cass.
